title: PBE
body: I have been signed up for PBE for about 3-4 years and havent heard back form anybody about PBE. id really like the oppurtunity to be able to play PBE. How come its been taking so long? Thanks for viewing my post guys. -Onl

replies.body: Once you've applied for PBE you'll need to wait for an invitation to join before you're able to create your account. At the moment however, PBE signups are currently [**closed for maintenance**](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe). Be sure to check that status page, as well as our post [**here **](https://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback/EGhTBUV6-pbe-signups-are-closed)to stay updated!
